item.title: Sophia Hammons Reveals the 1 Thing “Freakier Friday” Costar Jamie Lee Curtis Refused to Do While Filming (Exclusive)
item.description: Hammons also told PEOPLE how Curtis taught her “so much” on the set of the Disney sequel

item.title: Donald Trump Greeted by Massive Boos, and Some Cheers, During Commanders vs. Lions NFL Game
item.description: Trump's Nov. 9 appearance made him the first sitting president to attend a regular-season NFL game in almost five decades

item.title: Orlando Bloom Poses with Actress Rachel Lynn Matthews Dressed as His Ex Katy Perry for Halloween
item.description: Reps for Perry and Bloom confirmed their split in July after nine years together

item.title: Jake Shane Jokes Role Model's Sexiest Man Alive Centerfold Is 'Proof That Complaining Gets You Everywhere' (Exclusive)
item.description: Shane was referring to the musician's playful "beef" with PEOPLE after he didn't win Sexiest Musician last year

item.title: Stellan Skarsgård Reveals Why He Never Gives His Kids Parenting Advice and Why ‘It's a Lose-Lose Situation’ (Exclusive)
item.description: “I haven't given them any advice at all because it is very dangerous to do,” the actor tells PEOPLE before explaining his reasoning
